content.user_title: Generate Social Media Playbooks for Multi-Platform Campaigns
content.value_statement: Stop struggling with social media content planning. This skill creates complete playbooks with scripts, visuals, and posting schedules for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Facebook in minutes. Transform one content idea into optimized posts across every major platform automatically.
actual_capabilities: Generates 10-30 video and post concepts per playbook
Creates platform-specific content variations for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Facebook
Designs thumbnail concepts with text overlays and visual styles
Plans weekly posting schedules with optimal time windows
Structures content for database storage and automation integration
limitations: Requires existing marketing documentation for context and brand guidelines
Does not create actual video files or graphics - generates concepts only
Content must align with practical, no-hype brand tone

use_cases.title: Onboard new clients quickly
use_cases.description: Generate complete 30-day social media strategies for new clients across all major platforms in under 10 minutes.

use_cases.title: Launch products effectively
use_cases.description: Create platform-specific content that maximizes reach for product launches without expensive agencies.

use_cases.title: Scale content across platforms
use_cases.description: Turn one video idea into optimized content for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and LinkedIn automatically.

prompt_templates.title: New Client Playbook
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a social media playbook for a [industry] company targeting [audience]. Focus on [key services]. Include 20 video ideas with hooks, scripts, and thumbnail concepts.

prompt_templates.title: Product Launch Campaign
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a 6-week social media campaign for launching [product]. Create content for LinkedIn thought leadership, YouTube tutorials, and TikTok behind-the-scenes.

prompt_templates.title: Educational Series
prompt_templates.prompt: Develop a 30-day educational content series for a [profession] teaching [topic]. Include platform-specific variations for each post.

prompt_templates.title: Seasonal Promotion
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a comprehensive social media playbook for [business] [season] campaign. Include countdown content, product showcases, and deals across all platforms.

output_examples.input: Create a social media playbook for a digital marketing agency targeting e-commerce brands
output: Campaign Overview: Authority-building campaign for e-commerce brands
Primary Persona: E-commerce store owners ($100k-$1M revenue)
Platform Strategy: YouTube (long-form), LinkedIn (thought leadership), TikTok (quick tips)
Video Concepts: 15 ideas including common mistakes and growth strategies
Posting Schedule: 5 videos per week at optimal time windows per platform
Thumbnail Style: Bright colors, large text overlays, before/after comparisons

output_examples.input: Create a 30-day playbook for a local plumbing company
output: Campaign Goal: Lead generation for emergency services
Video Ideas: How-to guides, common problem solutions, team introductions
Platform Focus: Facebook community posts, YouTube tutorials, TikTok quick fixes
Call-to-Action Strategy: Emergency service phone number integration

best_practices: Always specify your target audience and industry for more relevant content ideas
Include your unique value proposition to differentiate from competitors
Review and customize the generated hooks to match your authentic voice
anti_patterns: Don't use generic prompts like make me viral content - be specific about your goals
Avoid copying competitor content exactly - use ideas as inspiration only
Don't schedule all content at once - leave room for trending topics and news

faq.question: Which platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram (Reels and carousels), LinkedIn, and Facebook. Each platform gets optimized content variations.

faq.question: How many content ideas will I get?
faq.answer: Each playbook generates 10-30 video and post concepts with platform-specific variations, hooks, scripts, and thumbnails.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my existing tools?
faq.answer: Yes, content is structured for database storage and can connect to scheduling tools like Buffer, Hootsuite, or custom APIs.

faq.question: Is my client data safe?
faq.answer: The skill only uses information you provide and does not store or transmit data externally. All processing happens locally.

faq.question: What if the content does not match my brand?
faq.answer: Each playbook includes brand tone guidelines and can be customized. Review and adjust hooks to match your voice.

faq.question: How does this compare to hiring an agency?
faq.answer: Get agency-quality strategy in minutes instead of weeks, at a fraction of the cost, with unlimited revisions.
